definition: to color (a picture etc)/to dye (fabric etc)/to stain (furniture etc)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Fine texture, uniform color-make-up to show you natural luster, and the makeup is not easily come off.
sentences.chinese: 質地細緻，上色均勻，不易脫妝，妝效呈現自然光澤。

sentences.english: Contain long-lasting formula, which is wild and easy to apply color.
sentences.chinese: 蘊含持久配方，質地溫和易上色。

sentences.english: Hold applicator at a slight angle and apply color to the base of the lashes.
sentences.chinese: 以稍微傾斜的角度拿着眼線筆，從睫毛的根部上色。

sentences.english: To bring colour to this shape, texturing is required.
sentences.chinese: 要給這個形體上色，需要貼圖。

sentences.english: He coloured the picture with crayon.
Delicate silky powder is easy for you to make up, give you more average and vivid color.
sentences.chinese: 細膩柔滑的眼影粉質易於上色，令色彩更均勻生動。

sentences.english: Its lead is soft and smooth, easy to color, lines could last long.
sentences.chinese: 筆心柔滑流暢，易上色，線條持久，防水抗油。

sentences.english: We propose a novel natural complex image colorization algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了全新的複雜自然圖像上色算法。

sentences.english: Natural dye extracts were used to colour the fabrics
sentences.chinese: 天然染料提取物用來給纖維上色。

sentences.english: Heck, for an even geekier tree, you could paint unused Ethernet cables to replace the garland.
sentences.chinese: 你可以給沒用的網線上色用它們來做花環。

sentences.english: These soups should be allocated two or three of the toast with food coloring.
sentences.chinese: 湯都要配兩種或三種燒上色的麪包一起食用。

sentences.english: An actual grizzly bear is represented in the exhibition in a hand-colored lithograph.
sentences.chinese: 一頭真正的灰熊在展覽中以手工上色的版畫呈現。

sentences.english: I then crayoned very gently the colours on top of this.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我在這上面用蠟筆輕輕地上色。

sentences.english: The vat method, for example, can be used to dye wool with onionskins .
sentences.chinese: 例如大桶法，往往就是使用洋蔥皮來對毛線上色。

sentences.english: My dad was specially adroit at making small hand-painted ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸尤其擅長做些手工上色的小裝飾品。

sentences.english: After flattening and painting a car is being ran to a drying room.
sentences.chinese: 經過平整和上色，車廂運送到烘乾室。

definition: to make a draft/to draft (a document)
to smudge (become smeared)/to smudge (create a blurred effect)/shading (wash painting technique)
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to lose color/to turn pale/to bleach/to fade
to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
